question: What is the primary function of a Zener diode? (ECE 2018)

options: Stores the address of the next instruction to be executed
Stores the result of an operation
correctAnswer: Stores the address of the next instruction to be executed

question: What is 'interlaced scanning' in television? (ECE 2018)
options: Scanning odd lines then even lines
correctAnswer: Scanning odd lines then even lines

options: Selects one of many inputs and directs it to a single output
Selects one of many outputs and directs an input to it
correctAnswer: Selects one of many inputs and directs it to a single output
